name: Rock Werchter

config_properties.name: Rock Werchter
config_properties.description: Belgium's largest annual rock music festival, held in Werchter since 1974, featuring major international artists.

ai_profile:
**Rock Werchter 2026: A Celebration of Musical Diversity**  

Rock Werchter 2026 boasts a lineup of 29 artists, blending an eclectic mix of genres to create a festival experience with something for everyone. Indie Rock takes the spotlight with six acts, closely followed by Alternative Rock (5) and a rich variety of styles such as Electronic, Pop, and Hip-Hop. The festival continues its legacy of showcasing both rising stars and established icons, offering audiences a wide spectrum of sounds, from soulful R&B to the energy of Hard Rock and the dreamy tones of Psych Pop.  

The festivalâ€™s roster highlights an international flavor, with artists hailing from six countries. Leading the charge are acts from the USA (12) and the UK (11), while Belgium, Canada, Germany, and Australia also bring their unique sounds to the stage. While the majority of performers are male (22), Rock Werchter includes a mix of female (3), non-binary (1), and mixed-gender (2) acts, reflecting a gradual move toward more gender representation in the music scene. However, the diversity of performers of color remains limited, as only two artists or groups identify as such.  

With an average artist rating of 7.62 and 100% of acts boasting Spotify links, Rock Werchter 2026 promises a high-quality musical experience. Nearly 60% of performers received ratings above 8, signaling a lineup packed with critically acclaimed talent. As always, Rock Werchter continues to be a beacon for music lovers, offering a vibrant and diverse celebration of global artistry.
